features: PLANT-DERIVED POWER CLEAN: Plant based ingredients help remove stains, sanitize silverware, emulsify grease and oil, protect metal from corrosion and minimize water spots
ZERO CHEMICAL ADDITIVES, GRAYWATER-FRIENDLY & BIODEGRADABLE: Dish washer soap pods from Clean Revolution contain NO chlorine, bleach or phosphates, harmful chemicals or synthetic fragrance
MADE IN THE USA & CRUELTY FREE: Our products are never tested on animals, nor made with animal-derived ingredients, Made & assembled 100% in the USA
CONVENIENT RESEALABLE PACKAGING: Our dish detergent pods are packed in a recyclable, sealing bag; Be sure to close seal so your dish pods don't get dry
LESS PLASTIC WASTE: Dishwasher Pods come in a small bag, unlike the large plastic containers of other brands
body.description: Clean Revolution Sun Lemon Dishwasher Detergent Pods, 80 Pods, Enzyme Powered Dish Soap, No Chemical Additives, No Residue

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Clean Revolution Dishwasher Detergent Pods Our all-natural cleaning formula removes dirt, grease and grime without harming human or aquatic life. Plant-derived ingredients help remove stains, sanitize silverware, emulsify grease and oil, protect metal from corrosion, and minimize water spots.

Naturally Derived Ingredients Clean Revolution Dish Pods are designed with ZERO chemical additives such as chlorine, bleach and phosphates. More Value, Less Plastic Waste This small pouch contains less plastic than bulky rigid containers. Family & Pet Safe Products are never tested on animals, nor made with animal-derived ingredients.
Sun Lemon A light, zesty burst of citrusy goodness, akin to a freshly sliced lemon infused with the refreshing warmth of rays of sunlight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Eco friendly packaging and nice cleaner
reviews.reviewText: Love the cardboard package, great alternative to unwanted and wasteful plastic and liquid pods

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cleans well, but strong artificial lemon scent
reviews.reviewText: I've been using liquid detergent for years and it just takes up so much space under the sink - and no matter if you're on the first or last load of the bottle, the bottle takes up the same volume of real estate. So, I decided to order these and give them a whirl. I love the ease of just popping one pod into the washer and moving on.PRO:- The concentrated pods mean that 80 loads actually doesn't take up a ton of storage space- works just as well as the 'name brand' liquid stuff (see before/after photos. yes, the glass itself is banged up)- Eco friendly and affordable- Lemon scent vanished/didn't cling to dishesCON:- the fake lemon scent is pretty powerful. If you're sensitive to chemical smells or the like, this may not be for you.8/10 would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have only been using these for a few weeks, but I am very happy with these pods. They are small, but powerful, and I like the non-nonsense, minimal waste packaging. I have found my glasses and dishes perfectly clean and clear, and will order it again because it does a perfect job and is great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't waste your money
reviews.reviewText: I'm very disappointed in these pods. I was really hoping to find a good quality, chemical free option. These didn't clean our dishes at all!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleans effectively, glasses dry spotless
reviews.reviewText: These work as well as the Cascade complete dishwasher pods I was using before. There's a bit of a lemony scent, especially while the wash cycle is in progress, but there's no scent left on the plates or inside the dishwasher after the cycle is done. I always load my dishes without any pre-rinsing and haven't had any issues with this detergent scrubbing them clean, even after the plates sat for a day or two. I've washed plenty of glasses and haven't had any issues with water spots -- my glasses come out very clear! Very happy with these, would continue to use in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A good maintenance item to have on hand for your dishwasher.
reviews.reviewText: Pods are small size so should have no issue dispensing/fitting your dispenser. Lemon scent helps freshen the smell up. Note that many washers will leave some water pooling up and while this may help clean this, it's good to check that drain/filter every so often as well and get as much of that water out to see how it's looking in there. These pods left a light lemon scent after running, pricing per pod isn't too bad but a little higher than some. Bag they come in is resealable zip-lock style. Overall seems like a decent option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn't work that well
reviews.reviewText: I've tried these twice. I followed instructions and only used one pod the first time. There were a few dishes that were still a bit dirty afterwards. The pods are really small in comparison to anything I've used previously. I tried two of the pods and it seemed to improve.However, if I had to use 2 pods per use at $22 a pack, I don't think that's a good use of my money. I'll finish out the pack, but won't repurchase. I'll update if I change my mind with more uses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Slightly smaller size fits my dishwasher better!
reviews.reviewText: The Clean Revolution Dishwasher Pods are working well in our dishwasher. I do prefer them to the name-brand pods because they are a little smaller and fit better into the pod case in the dishwasher. We do rinse our dishes before putting them into the dishwasher as we don't need to run it very often, so this may not be a fair test of the pods. I've used them about 6 times and have not found any residual food left on any dish, even when they weren't rinsed over the holidays with a houseful of family. I can't find any negatives about these pods and will continue to use them!
